title: Google\Cloud\Channel\V1\TrialSettings
name: TrialSettings
description:
Settings for trial offers.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.channel.v1.TrialSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.trial
params.description: Determines if the entitlement is in a trial or not: true - The entitlement is in trial. false - The entitlement is not in trial.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: Date when the trial ends. The value is in milliseconds using the UNIX Epoch format. See an example Epoch converter.

methods.name: getTrial
methods.description:
Determines if the entitlement is in a trial or not:

  • true - The entitlement is in trial.

  • false - The entitlement is not in trial.

Generated from protobuf field bool trial = 1;
